Texts.chs: 对日益增长的威胁的解决方案进行讨论。
Texts.Eng: Encoded discussions about solutions to growing threats.

Texts.chs: 我知道这是不道德的。我也很清楚这是必要的，不管我们喜欢与否。我不希望下周一觉醒来，面对10万亿强大的瑟卢锡安舰队急需食物。你呢?想象一下，如果让他们自己处理会发生什么?我们最好的只能面临死亡……奴隶是最坏的。面对这样的数字，根本没有奇迹。
Texts.Eng: I realize it is not moral. I also am quite aware that it is necessary, whether we like it or not. I have no urge to wake up next week facing a ten-trillion strong Thelusian fleet in need of food. Do you? Imagine what could happen if left to their own devices? We'd face annihilation at best...slavery at the worst. There is no winning in the face of such numbers.

Texts.chs: 最近的讨论使我相信绘世者问题和瑟卢锡安问题的答案是一样的。我建议我们找到一种方法来鼓励这两个物种之间的战争，以减少它们过剩的数量，以免我们都遭受无限制增长的后果，否则我们会被他们的人淹死。
Texts.Eng: Recent discussion has led me to believe that the answer to the Skath problem and the Thelusian problem is one and the same. I suggest we find a way to encourage a war between these two species in order to reduce their surplus populations, lest we all suffer the consequences of unchecked growth. We will otherwise choke on their numbers.
